message: When you have a '\\tr \tc1 \\sbx Part ...' the following \\tr should have have '\\tr \tc1 \\sbx Division ...'
When you have a '\\tr \tc1 \\sbx Division ...' the following \\tr should have have '\\tr \tc1 \\sbx Section ...'

message: A \\b should not follow a \\p.
A \\b must precede a \\p or \\b3 paragraph and a Division Box, except at v.1.
note: SC 21 Mar: As per above note, it should be \b then \p \v then \tr.... But if there is a Part (7.4), the \p \v will be above the Part tr rather than the Division tr.

message: A \\b must precede a \\p or \\b3 paragraph and a Section Box, except at v.1.
note: ditto above, but if there is a Division, the \p \v will be above the Division rather than the Section

message: A \\b must precede a \\p or \\b3 paragraph and a Part Box, except at v.1.
note: ditto above

message: A \\b must precede a \\p \\v and a Paragraph Box, except for verse 1.
note: ditto above

message: A \\s5 must follow a \\tr \\tc1 Division if there is no Section Box below it.
note: SC 22 Mar : messages for 7.6-9 changed.

message: A \\s5 paragraph must follow a \\tr \\tc1 Section if there is no Paragraph Box below it.
A \\s5 paragraph must follow a \\tr \\tc1 Part if there is no Division Box below it.
A \\tr Paragraph Box needs a \\p, \\b3, or \\b before it.
When \\tr follows \\p then a \\b shoud precede it (except @ v.1).
When \\tr follows \\b3 then a \\b shoud precede it (except @ v.1).
The chapter number in this \\s5 should match the current chapter number.
The verse number in this \\s5 should match the current verse number.
The first verse number in the range in this \\s5 should match current verse number.
